lead_paragraph: After 14 games in Coach Mike D’Antoni’s doghouse, the Knick sparkplug Nate Robinson got a chance to play and delivered against the Hawks.
snippet: After 14 games in Coach Mike D’Antoni’s doghouse, the Knick sparkplug Nate Robinson got a chance to play and delivered against the Hawks.

headline.main: Robinson Return Is Electric for Knicks
headline.seo: Nate Robinson Reclaims His Role as Knicks’ Sparkplug
headline.print_headline: Robinson Return Is Electric For Knicks
